# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would greatly enhance your business operations. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7200. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a discounted rate. I trust this proposal meets your expectations and aligns with your financial planning. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
